Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Daniel puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de frutas y bebidas, tales como gaseosas, refrescos, aguas minerales, entre otras; adicionalmente Daniel también trabaja como operador de maquinaria pesada en si ciudad, todas las mañanas desde tempranas horas inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.  
Daniel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como frutas, bebidas, así como mesas y sillas para acondicionar su negocio; de esta manera Daniel tendrá mejor abastecido y acondicionado su negocio, con ello él espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, con los cuales en un futuro no muy lejano desea ampliar su negocio, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Daniel is a man of 43. He lives in the city of Nazca with his wife and his three children, whom he loves and who are his principal purpose in life. He is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who, together with his wife, dedicates all his efforts to advancing his family. Unfortunately, Daniel was not able to study for a career, but he very much would have like to be able to do so. In his free time, he likes to spend a little time reading, and sometimes, to spoil his wife, he cooks her favorite food, which is the delicious chicken with rice.

On his own initiative, and with much effort and enthusiasm, Daniel set up his little business of selling fruits and beverages such as carbonated beverages, soft drinks, and mineral water, among others. In addition, Daniel also works as a heavy machine operator in his city. He begins his work every morning at an early hour. He can work approximately 12 hours a day, and he believes it is going well for him because of his dedication and because of the friendly treatment he offers his customers.

Daniel is very thankful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help offered he will be able to purchase merchandise such as fruits and beverages, in addition to tables and chairs to outfit his business. In this way Daniel will have a better stocked and equipped business. With it he hopes to increase his sales and his income, with which in the not-too-distant future he wants to expand his business. Thus he will continue working and exerting himself to advance his family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as fruits and beverages, as well as tables and chairs.

loans.name: Tamara Liseth

texts.es:
Tamara es una joven activa, comerciante, con su propio negocio la venta de ropa y cosméticos, iniciando hace tres años, con dinero propio, ya que ayudaba a su mama con la venta de fritanga, el cual ella le pagaba, y así comenzo su venta. Hoy en día casada, madre de un hijo de 6 años estudiante, su esposo labora en una empresa privada de vendedor de recarga móviles, siendo muy responsable.
Tamara tiene varios ciclos en Afodenic, donde ha logrado hacer mejoras a su casa y a su inversión de negocio, el cual está contenta al poder tener la oportunidad de este fondo kiva, que ha cambiado su vida, para las mejoras de la familia.
 Con este nuevo préstamo comprara: una docena de pantalón de varón, una docena de pantalón de mujer, camisas, ropa interior, cosméticos variados para seguir manteniendo la demanda, y crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Tamara is an active young woman; she is a salesperson with her own business where she sells clothing and makeup. She started her business three years ago with her own money since she helped her mother sell fried food that she paid for and later started her own business. At present, she is married, is a mother to a 6 year old boy who is in school. Her husband is very responsible and works in a private company selling cell phone minutes.

Tamara has had different loan cycles with Afodenic and has been able to change her home and business for the better. She is happy to have the opportunity from Kiva since it has changed her life and made improvements for her family.

With this new loan she will buy a dozen pair of men’s pants, a dozen pair of women’s pants, underwear, and various types of makeup to keep up demand and grow her business.

loans.use: buy a dozen men’s pants, a dozen women’s pants, underwear, and various types of makeup to keep up demand and to grow her business.

loans.name: Adriana Narcisa

texts.es:
La Señora. Adriana se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal Emprendedores del Futuro, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió pero su gente es de un corazón muy cálido y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora Adriana tiene 27 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 11, 10 y 6 años de edad, todos sus hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es comerciante, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Ella al igual que su esposo es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de productos de temporada como juegos pirotécnicos para fin de año o en carnaval bombas, confeti, etc., sus productos vende recorriendo la ciudad de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de juegos pirotécnicos para su negocio.
 
Su meta es  tener su local propio.
texts.en:
Sra. Adriana is receiving her fourth loan from the Communal Bank “Emprendedores del Futuro” (Entrepreneurs of the Future). She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known for its cold climate and its warm-hearted people who have maintained the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Sra. Adriana is 27 years old, married, and has three children (11, 10, and 6). All of her children are studying at a school in the city. Her husband is a merchant. They do not own a house, so they live in a rental property.

Just like her husband, Adriana is a merchant who sells seasonal products such as firework sets for New Year’s Eve or Carnival, cherry bombs, confetti, and other items. She sells her products by traveling throughout the city Monday through Saturday, but without a set schedule. Her new loan will be invested in the purchase of firework sets for her business.

Her goal is to have her own shop.

loans.use: to buy fireworks.

loans.name: Mansueto Adrian

texts.es:
Mansueto tiene 37 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Mala, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima muy frio en época de invierno, se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de manzana y plátano, asimismo posee playa muy hermosas las cuales son muy visitadas en época de verano por muchos turistas. Mansueto es padre soltero, su pequeño tiene 4 años y es padre y madre para él, al principio le fue un poco difícil atenderlo ya que no sabía cómo cambiar los pañales o calentar el biberón del pequeño, pero con mucho amor él pudo ir aprendiendo a cuidarlo mejor y sobre todo a darle mucho cariño. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta leer, sobre todo el periódico y en ocasiones jugar futbol con sus vecinos y llevar de paseo por las calles de su ciudad a su pequeño, asimismo le gusta disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos el solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Eléctrica.

Día a día Mansueto trabaja como chofer de taxi, con el fruto de su trabajo puedo solventar los gastos de su hogar y poder solventar los gastos de su pequeño, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 16 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque tiene un buen motivo para salir adelante el cual es su hijo y por ello trabaja con muchas ganas.

Mansueto está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo y comprar repuestos, así de esta manera tendrá un vehículo en buenas condiciones y podrá conducir de manera más segura, así el mejorara sus ingresos y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener un gran negocio”.
texts.en:
Mansueto is 37 years old and he lives in the city of Mala, a city characterized by its cold climate in the winter.  It is in an agricultural region where apples and bananas are grown.  Also, the region has beautiful beaches that are visited frequently in the summers by lots of tourists.

Mansueto is a single father.  His son is 4 years old and Mansueto acts as both mother and father to him.  At the beginning it was a bit difficult to care for him alone because he didn't know how to change diapers or warm the bottle, but with lots of love he was able to learn how to care for him and to give him lots of love.  When Mansueto has free time, he likes to read about the world in the newspapers and on occasion he plays soccer with his neighbors.  He also takes walks through the city streets with his son, and he likes to enjoy his favorite dish, rice with chicken.  Due to limited economic resources, he was only able to study until the fifth grade, but he would have liked to study to be an electrical engineer.

Day by day Mansueto works as a taxi driver.  With his earnings he is able to pay the household expenses and pay for the costs of raising his son.  He works about 10 hours per day and in that time he is able to drive about 16 clients.  He believes that his work is successful because he is motivated by trying to get ahead for himself and his son.  Therefore, he works very hard and is very motivated.

Mansueto is thankful for the Kiva loans and he gives thanks for the help that they have brought him.  He will be able to maintain his taxi and buy parts so that he can have a vehicle in good working condition so that he will be able to drive his clients safely.  This will also enable him to increase his income and to continue working hard so that he can make his biggest dream come true: "To give my son a good education and to have a successful business."

loans.use: to maintain and buy parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Cirila Lourdes

texts.es:
Cirila es una mujer de 51 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón, ella es una persona muy amable trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, Cirila siempre ha sido una mujer luchadora, que ha trabajado desde niña para apoyar a sus padres, lamentablemente no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su familia, desde hace varios años Cirila puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de verduras, ella cuenta con un pequeño espacio en el mercado central de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Cirila se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como: zapallos, limón, cebollas, papa, tomate, entre otros; de esta manera Cirila tendrá mejor abastecido su negocio, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda ampliar su negocio y con ello lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Cirila is a 51-year old woman who lives in the city of Cañete in the Imperial district with her husband and 4 children, who she loves and who are her main reason for being.  She is a friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, together with her husband, dedicates all her efforts to getting the family ahead.  Cirila has always been a fighter, and has worked since a young girl to support her parents.  Sadly, she was not able to pursue a professional career, but she would have liked very much to do so.  

With great effort, enthusiasm, and thanks to the support of her family, Cirila started a small business selling vegetables several years ago.  She has a small space in the central market of her city, and starts work very early in the morning.  She can work approximately 10 hours per day, and thinks that things are going well thanks to her dedication and the friendly service she offers customers.  Cirila is very grateful for the Kiva loans since, thanks to their help, she will be able to buy merchandise for her store such as:  pumpkins, lemons, onions, potatoes, and tomatoes, among other items.  

The purchases will help Cirila supply her business better, which she hopes will augment her income.  This will serve her in expanding her business in the near future, and to achieve her great dream of seeing her sons become professionals and good men.

loans.use: to buy the merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Lomas De San Pedro  (Montecristi) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Lomas De San Pedro se reúne cada quince días  en el sitio las Palmas del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

Este es un grupo de 12 señoras y 2 señores  que hace tiempo atrás  decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal, que les ha servido de mucho ya que han podido aumentar sus pequeños negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

Una de las socias de este grupo este grupo es la señora Lorena, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 3 hijos de 17, 15 y 8 años  de edad, los dos mayores están en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Ella es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que él no tiene un trabajo estable se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo y productos de Esika (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan tanto a ella como a sus compañeros.

Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos, que ellos sean profesionales y salgan adelante.
texts.en:
The Las Lomas de San Pedro cooperative bank meets every fifteen days in Las Palmas, in the canton of Montecristi.  The area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, particularly the famous straw Panama hats, are renown both nationally and internationally. 

The group is comprised of 12 women and 2 men who, some time ago, decided to join together to form this cooperative bank.  This has served them very well, since they have been able to grow their small businesses.  They dedicate themselves to different endeavors such as commerce, services, and food sales, among other activities.  One of the members of this group is Lorena who is 36, married, and has 3 children ages 17, 15 and 8 from this relationship.  The children all attend school and her husband dedicates himself to farming.

She is a homemaker who, in order to generate her own income to help her husband with the household expenses since his work is not stable, dedicates herself to selling clothing by catalog and Esika products (a line of cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories).  She works three days per week for two to three hours, delivering the products on credit and collecting every eight days.  She has been in this business for 4 years and things are going very well.

This loan is for the purchase of perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothing.  She’s been in the cooperative bank since it started, and she likes the help it provides for her and her associates.  Her dreams are to provide the best for her children, and to see them become professionals and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Hilario Tomas

texts.es:
Hilario es un hombre de 58 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, Hilario siempre ha sido un hombre luchador que ha trabajado desde muy joven, lamentablemente no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ir de pesca y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia y amigos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Hilario puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de elaboración y venta de bloquetas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Hilario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea hacer el pintado, tarrajeado y pequeñas refacciones; de esta manera Hilario tendrá su hogar en condiciones más seguras y adecuadas que brindan mayor bienestar, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Hilario is a 58-year old man who is single and lives in the city of Camaná.  He is a person who is very friendly, hard-working, enthusiastic and has a great desire to succeed.  Hilario has always been a fighter and has worked from a young age.  Sadly, he was not able to study for a professional career, but he would have liked very much to do so.  In his free time, he likes to go fishing and, on occasion, cook the very delicious Lomo Saltado to share with family and friends.  By his own initiative, and with much effort and enthusiasm, Hilario put into motion his small business making and selling cinderblocks.  He works every day starting from the early morning hours, and can work approximately 10 hours per day.  He thinks things are going well because of his dedication and the friendly service he provides his customers.

Hilario is very grateful for the Kiva loans since, thanks to the help they provide, he will be able to make improvements to his house.  He would like to paint, plaster and make small repairs so that his home is in more secure and adequate condition, which will provide further well-being.  In this manner, he will keep working and putting forth effort in order to get ahead.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Ketty Aracely

texts.es:
En el barrio Umiña de la ciudad de  Manta cada 15 días se reúne el Banco Comunal Umiña, ciudad conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y  por  ser uno de los puertos más importantes del país y de América situado a orillas del Pacifico.
 
En este lugar vive la señora Ketty, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 7 años de edad la misma que estudia  en escuela. El marido trabaja en el extranjero.
 
Ella con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y con esto solventar sus gastos y los de su pequeña hija se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, joyas de plata y productos por catálogos de Avon, y Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días más que todo en las horas de la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos,  deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, la mercadería la va a comprar a Guayaquil y también le envían del extranjero. Lleva más de 7 años en su negocio y le ha ido muy bien.
 
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que los créditos son los que le ayudan a surtir su negocio, su negocio es muy bueno y las ganancias del crédito anterior le sirvieron  para gastos relacionados con el inicio de clases de su pequeña hija y para gastos del hogar, ahora espera recibir este crédito para  comprar joyas de plata, ropa,  perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas y otros productos para seguir con su negocio. Está desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brinda el banco.
 
Su sueño es darle lo mejor a su pequeña hija.
texts.en:
The Umiña cooperative bank meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of Umiña, located in the city of Manta.  This city is known for its beautiful beaches, for its cuisine, and for being one of the most important ports of the country, as well as of America, because of its location on the shores of the Pacific.  This is where Ketty, 44, lives with her husband and their 7-year old daughter who is in school.  Her husband works abroad.

With the goal of generating her own income and, with these funds, meeting her and her daughter’s expenses, she dedicates herself to selling all types of clothing, silver jewelry, and Avon and Yanbal catalog products (beauty supplies, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories).  She works every day, mostly in the mornings, as this is when it’s easier for her to make her rounds.  She delivers on credit and charges every 8 days.  She goes to Guayaquil to buy the merchandise, and also imports from abroad.  She has been in this business for more than 7 years, and things are going well.

She is repeating the loan because the credits help her supply her business.  Her enterprise is very good, and the earnings generated by the previous loan helped her with expenses related to her small daughter’s education and for the household.  Currently, she hopes to receive this loan to buy silver jewelry, clothing, perfumes, costume jewelry, creams and other products to continue with her business.  She has been in the cooperative bank since its initiation, and likes it because of the help the bank provides.

Her dream is to provide her daughter with all the best.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry, clothing, perfumes, trinkets, cosmetics, crèmes, and other products.

loans.name: Gloria Elizabeth

texts.es:
En el barrio Umiña de la ciudad de  Manta cada 15 días se reúne el Banco Comunal Umiña, ciudad conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y  por  ser uno de los puertos más importantes del país y de América situado a orillas del Pacifico.
 
En este lugar vive la señora Gloria, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  17 y 14 años de edad que  estudian en colegio. Su esposo es chofer.

Ella con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar hace mas de 10 años puso un pequeño bazar en su casa, allí vende de ropa de todo tipo,  artículos de bazar, papelería, joyas de Romanel y productos de Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 19h00, hay días que ella también sale a ofrecer sus productos y de cobrar ya que deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. 

Está repitiendo el crédito ya que el crédito anterior le ayudo a surtir aun mas su bazar con artículos que no tenia, esto le sirvió ya que mejoraron sus ventas y las ganancias le han servido para gastos relacionados con los estudios de sus hijos, que es para lo cual ella trabaja. Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar joyas, ropa, perfumes, útiles escolares entre otras cosas. Lleva más de 2 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son a muy bajos intereses.
 
Sus sueños son seguir aumentando su negocio y que sus hijos sean muy buenos profesionales en el futuro.
texts.en:
The Umiña cooperative bank meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of Umiña, located in the city of Manta.  This city is known for its beautiful beaches, for its cuisine, and for being one of the most important ports of the country, as well as of America, because of its location on the shores of the Pacific.  This is where Gloria, 43, lives; she is married and has two children ages 17 and 14 from this relationship.  Her husband is a driver.

With the goal of generating her own income to help her husband with the household expenses, she started a small store in her home more than 10 years ago.  She sells all types of clothing there, such as trinkets, paper goods, Romanel jewelry and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women’s accessories).  She works every day from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm.  Some days she also goes out to offer her products and to collect payment, since she leaves items on credit and charges every eight days.

She is repeating the loan because the financing helped her supply her business with items she didn’t have.  This served her well, since her sales improved and the earnings helped toward the educational expenses of her children, which is the reason she works.  She will use this loan to buy jewelry, clothing, perfumes and school supplies, among other items.  She has been in the cooperative bank for more than 2 years, and likes it because the loans are at very low interest rates.

Her dreams are to continue expanding her business, and to see her children become successful professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy jewelry, clothes, perfume, school supplies, etc.

loans.name: Maryuri Maribel

texts.es:
En el barrio Umiña de la ciudad de  Manta cada 15 días se reúne el Banco Comunal Umiña, ciudad conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y  por  ser uno de los puertos más importantes del país y de América situado a orillas del Pacifico.
 
En este lugar vive la señora Maryuri, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 10, 8 años y un bebé de seis meses, los  dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica en Manta.

Ella para salir adelante junto a su familia tiene una tienda en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas, también realiza recargas telefónicas, con lo cual se gana algo extra, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando ellos pueden y están desocupados. A ella le gusta su trabajo ya que así se gana algo y siempre está atenta a las necesidades de sus hijos ya que no tiene que salir de su casa. Tiene 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Está repitiendo el crédito, su tienda se ha mantenido ya que cuenta con muy buena clientela que a diario le compran en su local, ahora también está vendiendo helados de una marca nacional para lo cual le dieron un congelador y productos y con esto ella está obteniendo mejores ingresos. Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, helados y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 años y le gusta porque con el primer crédito que recibió empezó su negocio.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the city of Manta’s Umiña neighborhood, the Banco Comunal Umiña meets every 15 day. Manta is known for its beautiful beaches and excellent restaurants, and is one of the most important Pacific ports in Ecuador and, indeed, in all of South America.

Maryuri, 36 years old, is a resident of Umiña. She is married and has three children, two young children aged ten and eight and a baby of six months. The two older children go to school. Her husband works in a factory in Manta.

To help support her family, she runs a store in their home in which she sells all sorts of products, including rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, grains, fruits, and vegetables, and also offers a service to put more money on people's cell phone for a little extra income. She works every day from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. or even later. Her children and husband help her when they can and do not have other obligations. She likes her work because it brings in an income and allows her to look after her children's needs at all time, since she doesn't have to leave the house. She's had her store for five years and it's going very well.

She is requesting another loan. Her store is successful because she has a solid customer base that comes to her store to shop every day. She has started selling ice cream for an Ecuadorean company, which gave her a freezer and products to sell. This new addition to the shop is bringing in more profits. She will use this loan to stock her store, buying rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, ice cream, and other staple goods. She has been a member of the Banco Comunal for five years, and she likes it because the first loan she received helped her start her business.

Her goals are to build a successful business and expand her store every day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, ice cream, and other staple goods.

loans.name: Cesario

texts.es:
Cesario es un hombre de 69 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposa y sus 3 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, lamentablemente no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Veterinaria que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por el campo y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Chicharrón de Chancho para compartir con su familia.   
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias a las enseñanzas de su Padre, Cesario puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de leche, él cuanta con algunas vacas, las cuales ordeña para obtener la leche, todas los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes. 
Cesario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento del corral donde crías a sus vacas; de esta manera Cesario criará a sus animalitos en un lugar más adecuado y seguro para su mejor desarrollo,  con ello él espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales en un futuro no muy lejano le servirán para comprar más vacas y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Cesario is a 69 year old gentleman who lives in the city of Nazca with his wife and his 3 children, who he loves and are his main reason for living. He is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, alongside his wife, strives to get his family ahead in life. 

Unfortunately he was unable to pursue a career in veterinary studies as he had hoped, but he very much would have liked to. In his free time, he likes to go hiking in the countryside and sometimes cooking a delicious dish of chicarrón de chancho (pork crackling) to share with his family. 

With a lot of hard work, enthusiasm, and thanks to the Lord's teachings, Cesario set up his small business selling milk. He has a few cows which he milks, and he starts work every day in the early hours of the morning. He can work roughly 10 hours a day and believes that the business is going well as a result of his dedication and the way he handles customers. 

Cesario is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help given, he will be able to make improvements to the cow pen where he rears his cows. In this way, Cesario will rear his animals in a more appropriate and safe place so that they grow better. Through this improvement, he hopes to grow his sales and his financial income, which will enable him to buy more cows and expand the business in the not-so-distant future.

loans.use: to make improvements to a cow pen.

loans.name: Luisa Solanda

texts.es:
En el barrio Umiña de la ciudad de  Manta cada 15 días se reúne el Banco Comunal Umiña, ciudad conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y  por  ser uno de los puertos más importantes del país y de América situado a orillas del Pacifico. 

En este lugar vive la señora Luisa, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada hace varios años pero aun no ha podido tener hijos. Lleva más de 7 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le ha brindado la institución.

Ella para salir adelante junto a su esposo se dedica al comercio,  vende ropa de todo tipo, carteras, bisutería entre otros productos, tiene un pequeño local en el centro de la ciudad, allí también su esposo en las afueras de su local se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres, trabajan todos los días. Le encanta su negocio ya que siempre cuenta con la compañía de su querido esposo y cuando uno de los dos no está el otro se hace cargo de los dos negocios. Llevan más de 10 años dedicados al comercio y siempre les ha ido muy bien
 
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, carteras, bisutería y una parte para que su esposo lo utilice en comprar frutas y legumbres.
 
Su sueño es tener su propio local ya que en el que venden es de su suegro.
texts.en:
The Umiña communal bank meets every 15 days in the Umiña neighborhood of the city of Manta. Manta is a city known for its beautiful beaches, its gastronomy and for being one of the most important ports in the country and in the Americas, located on the shores of the Pacific.

Luisa who is 48, lives in this area, she married several years ago but she has not yet been able to have children. She has been part of the communal bank for more than seven years, and she likes it because of the help which the entity has always given her.

To get ahead in life, Luisa works in sales along with her husband. She sells all types of clothes, handbags, jewelry among other products. She has small shop in the city center. Her husband also works in the area surround the sales location selling fruit and vegetables, with both of them working every day. Luisa loves her business as she can always rely on her beloved husband's company, and when one of them isn't around, the other runs the two businesses. They have spent more than 10 years dedicated to trade and it has always gone well for them.

This loan is to buy clothes, handbags, jewelry and part for her husband to use buying fruit and vegetables. Luisa's dream is to own her own premises as the one on which they are selling belongs to her father-in-law.

loans.use: to buy clothes, handbags, jewelry, and fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Manessa

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 4 sobrinhos que vivem com ela.	
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, ferro, pedra, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e fazer crescer o seu negócio para melhorar as condições da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é falta de fundos suficientes e a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's single and has three children, all of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports four nephews who live with her.
She's a businesswoman who runs her own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building her house and to make her business grow, so that she can improve her family's living conditions. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the lack of sufficient funds and her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais que vivem com ele. 	
É serralheiro e trabalha por conta própria. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e poder ter carta de condução, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos para realizar todos os seus projectos.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children, one of whom attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his parents who live with him.
He's a self-employed metal worker. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (sand, cement, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his house and to obtain his driver's license. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is the lack of sufficient funds for implementing all his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (sand, cement, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Simião

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É alfaiate bastante conhecido na zona onde vive. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (blocos, cimento, barrotes, chapas de zinco, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e construir dependências para aluguer, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais e ampliar a sua alfaiataria.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a tailor who's very well-know in the area where he lives. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies bricks, cement, beams, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his house and to build rooms for renting. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is working harder and expanding his tailor's workshop.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (bricks, cement, beams, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Zaqueu

texts.pt:
Solteiro e pai de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua sobrinha que vive com ele. 	
É pensionista dos CFM e também negociante dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (leite, sabão, arroz, caldo, ovos, óleo, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja desenvolver mais o seu negócio e adquirir uma viatura para transportar os produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos para adquirir um meio de transporte, e trabalhar mais para obter mais rendimento para sustentar os estudos dos filhos.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children, all of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his niece who lives with him.
He's a a pensioner of CFM (the Mozambique Ports and Railways company) and also a businessman who runs his own business selling various products. With this loan he intends to purchase goods (milk, sopa, rice, broth, cooking oil, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to further develop his business and to purchase a vehicle for transporting his merchandise. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is not having funds to purchase a means of transportation, and working harder in order to increase his profits and support his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (milk, soap, rice, broth, eggs, cooking oil, etc.).

loans.name: Marcela

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 6 filhos dos quais 4 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais um irmão que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, óleo, feijão, sabonete, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja melhorar as condições da sua casa e apostar nos estudos dos seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar todos os seus projectos e adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
She's married and has six children, four of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports a brother who lives with her.
She's a businesswoman who runs her own business selling basic household necessities. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, flour, cooking oil, beans, soap, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to improve her living conditions and invest in her children's education. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is not having enough funds for implementing all her projects, and also purchasing a vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, flour, cooking oil, beans, soap, etc.).

loans.name: Ines

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais uma neta que vive com ela. 	
Trabalha como activista numa instituição e tem um negocio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (farinha, amendoim, sal, arroz, óleo, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio e adquirir uma viatura para o transporte dos produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e concretizar todos os seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's married and has four children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports a granddaughter who lives with her.
She works as an activist for an institution and she also owns her own business selling basic household necessities. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (flour, peanuts, salt, rice, cooking oil, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business and to purchase a vehicle for transporting her products. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is repaying the loan as scheduled and implementing all her projects.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (flour, peanuts, salt, rice, cooking oil, etc.).

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
Solteira e não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 irmãs que vivem com ela. 	
É polícia e quadro do Ministério do Interior. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, pregos, barrotes, e outros), para remodelar e ampliar a sua capoeira de criação de frangos de corte. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua formação superior e construir dependências para aluguer, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir o ensino superior e criar frangos para revenda, como forma de aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
She's single and doesn't have children. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports two sisters who live with her.
She's a police officer and a staffer of the Ministry of the Interior. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, nails, beams, etc.) in order to remodel and enlarge the hutch where she raises broiler chickens.
In the future she wishes to graduate from college and to build rooms for renting. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is completing her higher education and raising chickens for re-selling, as a way of increasing her profits.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, nails, beams, etc.) in order to remodel and enlarge the hutch where she raises broiler chickens.

loans.name: Isilda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos dos quais apenas 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 5 netos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, cervejas, refrescos, amendoim, óleo, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio construindo um estabelecimento para expor os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conquistar mais clientes e fazer crescer o seu negócio para obter mais rendimento.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, only one of whom attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports five grandchildren who live with her.
She's a businesswoman who runs her own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, beer, refreshments, peanuts, cooking oil, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business by building a store to display her merchandise. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is getting more customers and making her business grow in order to increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, beer, refreshments, peanuts, cooking oil, etc.).

loans.name: Zelia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 sobrinha que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dono do próprio negócio de venda de ovos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar caixas de ovos na RSA, para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio construindo um estabelecimento comercial e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é falta de fundos de investimento e o bem – estar da sua família.
texts.en:
She's married and has two children, one of whom attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports a niece who lives with her.
She's a businesswoman who runs her own business selling eggs. With this loan she intends to purchase more egg cartons in South Africa in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business by building a store and to improve her family's living conditions. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the lack of funds for investing and her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase eggs for selling.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 6 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 sobrinhos que vive com ela. 	
Trabalha como auxiliar de cozinha. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, chapas, barrotes e outros) para fazer a cobertura e reboque da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja melhorar as condições sanitárias da sua casa e construir casas de aluguer, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos de investimento para os seus projectos
texts.en: Ermelinda is married and is the mother of six children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports two nephews/nieces that live with her.  She works as an assistant in a kitchen.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, iron, metal sheets, beams, etc.) to put a roof on her home.  In the future, she hopes to improve the sanitation services in her home and to build houses to rent out.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is having insufficient funds to invest in her projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, metal sheets, beams, etc.) to put a roof on her home.

loans.name: Elina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos, dos quais 1 frequenta a Escola e outros ainda menores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É policial e quadro do Ministério do Interior. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (tintas, pincéis, rolos de pintar, mão de obra e outros) para continuar com os acabamentos da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja continuar com os seus estudos ampliar a casa e construir um muro de vedação, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é iniciar uma actividade comercial para incrementar a renda para poder responder os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Elina is married and has 3 children, 1 of whom attends school.  The others are still too young.  She owns the home where she lives with her family and does not support anyone else.  

She is a police officer with the Ministry of the Interior.  With this loan she plans to purchase construction materials (paint, brushes, paint rollers, labor, etc.) to continue the finish work on her home. In the future she wants to continue her education, add on to her home, and construct a wall. For this reason she promises to make her payments on schedule to be able to request additional loans from Hluvuku.

Her greatest challenge is to be able to start a small business to increase income and complete her projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (paint, brushes, paint rollers, labor, etc.) to continue the finish work on her home.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.pt:
Viúvo e pai de 4 filhos, alguns ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como agricultor e pescador já bastante tempo. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar uma motobomba para irrigar as suas machambas e aumentar as áreas de produção. 
No futuro deseja terminar o seu barco de pesca e ampliar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar muito urgente o barco que em manutenção para poder terminar o empréstimo em pouco tempo.
texts.en: Vicente is a widowed father of 4 children, some of whom still attend school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family, and does not support anyone else.  He has worked as a farmer and fisherman for a long time.  With this loan he plans to purchase a motorized pump to irrigate his farm and increase his production area.  In the future he wants to finish his fishing boat and add on to his house.  For this reason he promises to make his payments on schedule so he can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is to urgently finish maintenance on his boat so that he can pay off the loan quickly.

loans.use: to purchase a motorized pump to irrigate his farmland and increase his production area.

loans.name: Sungane

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 7 filhos, só vive com os 4 mais novos que ainda frequentam a Escola, tem casa própria e sustenta um neto que vive com ele. 	
É pensionista militar e agricultor. Com este empréstimo pretende pagar os trabalhos de lavoura, gradagem e sulcamento da sua machamba. 
No futuro deseja construir uma casa condigna para a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar as áreas de cultivos para crescimento da produtividade.
texts.en: Sungame is married and has 7 children.  The 4 youngest still live with him and attend school.  He owns his own home and also supports a grandson who lives with him.  He has a military pension and he is a farmer.  With this loan he plans to pay for tilling, harrowing, and trenching his farmland.  In the future he would like to build a worthy home for his family, for that reason he promises to make his payments as scheduled in order to be able to request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is to expand his land under cultivation in order to increase productivity.

loans.use: to pay for tilling, harrowing, and trenching of his farmland.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, 1 dos quais vai a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É operador de máquinas pesadas numa empresa privada e comerciante. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (cerveja, arroz, açúcar, refrescos, vinhos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade de mercadoria no seu estabelecimento. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e o seu estabelecimento comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos para poder realizar tudo o mais rápido possível.
texts.en: Ricardo is married and has 3 children, 1 of whom attends school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and does not support anyone else. He operates heavy machinery for a private company and he also has his own business.  With this loan he plans to purchase products (beer, rice, sugar, soft drinks, wine, etc.) to increase the stock of merchandise at his store.  In the future he wants to add on to his house and expand his store.  For this reason he promises to make his payments as scheduled so that he can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is a lack of funds that prevents him from achieving all of this as quickly as possible.

loans.use: to buy products for sale (beer, rice,sugar, soft drinks, wine, etc.)

loans.name: Patricio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua irmã enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas de casa. 	
É pensionista militar e com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (pregos, barrotes, blocos, cimento, areia, ferro e outros) para iniciar uma outra obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende iniciar a criação de frangos de corte terminar a sua casa, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento para iniciar a actividade comercial.
texts.en: Patricio is married and has 3 children who attend school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he also supports his sister, sending her money to help with household expenses.  He has a military pension and with this loan he plans to buy construction materials (nails, beams, blocks, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to continue construction on his home.  In the future he plans to begin raising broiler chickens, and to finish his home.  For this reason, he plans to make his payments on schedule so he can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is a lack of funds to start his own business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (nails, beams, blocks, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to continue construction on his home.

loans.name: Valente

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É formador de professores numa Escola de formação de professores e tem um negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (massas, arroz, açúcar, refrescos, vinhos, feijão e outros) para aumentar a quantidade de mercadoria no seu estabelecimento. 
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial próprio porque actualmente usa do seu sobrinho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a educação dos filhos dado ao elevado custo de propinas.
texts.en: Valente is married and has 4 children who attend school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he does not support anyone else.  He trains teachers at a teacher education school and he also has a business selling basic goods.  With this loan he plans to purchase products (dough, rice, sugar, wine, beans, etc.) to increase the stock of merchandise in his store.  In the future he wants to construct his own store becaue he currently uses his nephew's shop.  For this reason he plans to make his payments as scheduled in order to request additional loans form Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is providing an education for his children given the high cost of required payments.

loans.use: to buy products for resale (dough, rice, sugar, soft drinks, wine, beans, etc.)

loans.name: Moises

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 8 filhos e 2 dos quais frequentam a Escola os restantes já tem suas próprias famílias, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém para alem dos 2 filhos. 	
Trabalha como segurança numa empresa privada e possui um negócio próprio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (cadeiras e mesas plásticas, mantas, camas e outros) para aumentar a quantidade de mercadoria e posterior revenda. 
No futuro gostaria de construir um aviário e um estabelecimento comercial no seu quintal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a procurar formas de aumentar a sua receita.
texts.en: Moises is married and has 8 children, 2 of whom attend school.  The rest already have their own families.  He owns the home where he lives and does not support anyone else besides the two children at home.  He works as a security guard in a private company and also has his own business.  With this loan he plans to purchase products (plastic tables and chairs, blankets, beds, etc.) to increase his stock of merchandise for later resale.   In the future he would like to construct an aviary and a commercial locale on his farm.  For that reason he promises to make his loan payments as scheduled so he can request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is finding ways to increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase products for sale (plastic chairs and tables, blankets, beds, etc.)

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, dois dos quais já frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É operário agrícola já há bastante tempo. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, blocos, cimento, areia, ferro e outros) para iniciar uma outra obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende terminar a sua formação e concluir a sua residência, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar a dobrar para poder cobrir os projectos com os rendimentos obtidos.
texts.en: Lazaro is married and has 3 children, 2 of whom already attend school.  He owns the home where he lives with this family and does not support anyone else.  He has been an agricultural worker for a long time.  With this loan he plans to purchase construction materials (beams, blocks, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to start another construction project on his home.  In the future he plans to complete his education and finish his home, so he promises to make his loan payments on schedule in order to request more loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is to work double in order to complete these projects with his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (beams, blocks, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to start another construction project on his home.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe que vive com ele. 	
Trabalha como serralheiro e comerciante. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, açúcar, farinha, óleo, cervejas, vinho e outros) para poder aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria e responder a demanda da sua clientela. 
No futuro gostaria de se tornar um grande revendedor na zona, esta confiante nisso porque possui um contentor em sua casa, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos que possam responder as suas necessidades.
texts.en: Joao is married and has 2 adult children.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he also supports his mother, who lives with him.  He is a metalworker and also has a store.  With this loan he plans to purchase products (rice, sugar, flour, cooking oil, beer, wine, etc.) in order to increase his inventory and meet his customers' needs.   In the future he would like to become a large reseller in his area.  He is confident he can do this because he has a storage container in his home.  He promises to make his payments as scheduled in order to request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is to obtain sufficient funds to meet his needs.

loans.use: to buy products for sale (rice, sugar, flour, cooking oil, beer, wine, etc.)

loans.name: Constantino

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos já maiores de idade não vão a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus enteados que vivem com ele. 	
É militar e trabalha como segurança. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (material eléctrico, mão de obra e outros) para poder continuar com o melhoramento da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende continuar a melhorar a sua casa para garantir conforto a sua família, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir liquidar o empréstimo para solicitar outro o mais rápido possível.
texts.en: Constantino is married and has 3 adult children who are not in school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he also supports his stepchildren, who live with him.  Constantino is in the military and works as a security guard.  With this loan he plans to purchase construction materials (electrical supplies, labor, etc.) to continue making improvements to his home.  In the future he plans to continue making improvements to his home to guarantee comfort for his family.  He promises to make his loan payments as scheduled in order to request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is paying off his loan in order to request another one as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (electrical supplies, labor, etc.) to continue making improvements to his home.

loans.name: Feniasse

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos já maiores de idade apenas 1 ainda vai a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais enviando algum valor para ajudar nas despesas de casa. 	
É carpinteiro de profissão. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (blocos, cimento, areia, ferro e outros) para ampliação e melhoramento da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende continuar a melhorar a sua casa para garantir conforto a sua família, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de material de construção no mercado local.
texts.en: Feniasse is married and has 3 adult children, 1 of whom is still in school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he also supports his parents, sending them money to help out with household expenses.   He is a carpenter.  With this loan he will purchase construction materials (blocks, cement, sand, iron, etc.) in order to expand and improve his house.  In the future he plans to continue making improvements to his home to make it comfortable for his family.  He promises to make his loan payments as scheduled in order to request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is the high cost of construction materials in the local market.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (blocks, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to expand and improve his home.

loans.name: Jonas

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, ambos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 primos que vivem com ele. 	
Tem um negócio de venda de acessórios de tractores. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar acessórios (filtros, injectores, veios e outros) para fazer a reparação de seu tractor.
No futuro pretende se tornar num grande vendedor e fornecedor de acessórios de tractores, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é insuficiência de fundos para concretizar os seus projectos.
texts.en: Jonas is married and has 2 children who both attend school.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he also supports 2 cousins who live with him.   He has a business selling tractor accessories.  With this loan he plans to purchase parts (filters, injectors, shafts, etc.) to repair his tractor.  In the future he plans to become a large scale vendor and provider of tractor accessories.  He promises to make his loan payments as scheduled in order to request future loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is a lack of funds to bring his projects to fruition.

loans.use: to purchase parts (filters, injectors, shafts, etc.) to repair his tractor.

loans.name: Felix

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho ainda menor de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como motorista numa empresa privada. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, ferro e outros) para dar continuidade com o melhoramento da sua casa.
No futuro pretende abrir um restaurante e casar oficialmente, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar ainda mais para poder realizar mais empréstimos de forma a alcançar os seus projectos.
texts.en: Felix is married and has 1 young son.  He owns the home where he lives with his family and he does not support anyone else.  He works as a driver for a private company.  With this loan he plans to purchase construction materials (cement, sand, stones, iron, etc.) to continue making improvements on his home.  In the future he plans to open a restaurant and to officially get married.  He promises to make his payments as scheduled in order to request additional loans from Hluvuku.  The challenge he faces is to work even more in order to obtain future loans as a means to complete his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (cement, sand, stones, iron, etc) to continue making improvements to his home.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 21 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, lamentablemente Juan no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Mecánica que desea, pero sueña con poder hacerlo muy pronto, en sus ratos libres busca pequeños empleos y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de su familia, Juan trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, él cuenta con una mototaxi propia, la cual es su herramienta principal de trabajo, todas los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, Juan puede trabajar un promedio de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Juan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una mototaxi, a fin de utilizarla para ampliar su negocio; de esta manera Juan seguirá trabajando y espera aumentar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un fututo no muy lejano pueda cumplir su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional y tener su negocio propio.
texts.en:
Juan is 21 years old, he is single and lives in the city of Ica. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who is very keen to get ahead. Unfortunately Juan was not able to study a career in mechanical engineering as he had hoped, but he dreams of being able to do so very soon. In his free time, he seeks out small jobs, and sometimes cooks a delicious dish of Carapulcra con sopa seca to share with his family. 

With a lot of hard work, enthusiasm, and thanks to the support of his family, Juan works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He has his own motorcycle taxi which is his main business tool. Juan starts his work in the early hours of the morning every day, going around the streets of the city searching for passengers. On average, Juan can work 12 hours a day, and he thinks that it is going well thanks to his dedication and the friendly treatment he offers his customers.

Juan is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help that has been given he will be able to buy a motorcycle taxi in order to expand his business. In this way, Juan can continue working and he hopes to increase his financial income, which will be very useful to him so that in the not-so-distant future he can fulfill his dream of being a good professional and have his own business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es:
Reyna, de 57 años de edad, es una mujer muy alegre y amable. Está casada con Juan ya hace varios años quien es obrero y padre de sus 4 hijos.  Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y un nieto a quien cría y desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Reyna es el de realizar costura, tiene una taller pequeño pero muy bien instalado en su casa, ahí hace trabajos por encargo o cuando no tiene ningún encargo hace sus propios diseños y creaciones para poder vender a sus clientes que siempre van en busca de un nuevo modelo y diseño para comprar. Lleva haciendo este trabajo desde muy joven, siempre tuvo curiosidad  y  su madre le enseñó todo lo que sabe y desde ahí decidió trabajar en ésta actividad, y hasta el momento lo realiza  sola. Considera rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancias que le deja.
A ella le gusta todo de su trabajo, siempre está alegre ya que gana dinero haciendo lo que le gusta, además que siempre tiene clientes, espera poder seguir así con su trabajo. Este es el crédito número 8 con MFP, por tanto cuenta con su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado 1800 soles, comprará materiales para continuar con su trabajo como telas, hilos, elásticos, entre otros, además comprará una maquina de coser valorizado en 350 nuevos soles ya que desea implementarse para tener un mejor acabado en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Reyna, age 57, is a cheerful and friendly woman. For several years she has been married to Juan, who works as a laborer and is the father of their four children. Reyna and her husband live in their own home along with a grandson, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. She works as a seamstress and has a small, but functional workshop that is located in her house. Reyna’s work is done from orders, but whenever she has few orders, she works on her own designs and creations that she sells to her customers who are always looking to buy something new. She has been working ever since she was a young woman. Reyna has always been curious, so her mother taught her everything she knows. She eventually decided to work as a seamstress and now manages her business by herself. Reyna considers her business to be profitable since it generate a good revenue stream.

She likes everything about her work, but she is always happy to be earning a living by doing something that she enjoys. Reyna has many customers, so she hopes to continue working. This will be her eighth loan with MFP, so she is pleased to be in this partnership in order to continue pursuing her goals. With the amount of 1,800 PEN that she requested, Reyna will buy materials needed to continue her work such as fabrics, thread, elastics, and other items. She will also purchase a sewing machine valued at 350 PEN so that she can do a better job with the finishing touches on her work.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabrics, thread, elastics, and other supplies.

loans.name: María Elza

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Desarrollo Femenino. Este lugar se lo conoce por su rica gastronomía y su vegetación,  la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y comercio en general.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 71 años de edad, es madre soltera de siete hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa.

Ella es una mujer muy luchadora que para salir adelante sola se dedica a preparar y vender salchichas, tiene un restauran en su casa en el cual vende sus deliciosos alimentos como caldo de salchicha acompañando de un buen plátano asado y las salchichas asadas, estos platos  son muy apetecidos por sus clientes. Ella lleva más de 25 años con este negocio el cual le ha permitido salir adelante y tener mucha clientela que saben lo delicioso que ella prepara estos alimentos.  Trabaja todos los días con la ayuda de su hijo.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, tripas de chancho y varios víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque en todo este tiempo le han ayudado mucho.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y tener buena salud.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the members of the Desarrollo Femenino community bank meet in the parish of Calderón, in the city of Portoviejo. This city is known for its delicious cuisine and its vegetation.  Most of the local people work in farming and general commerce.

This is where María lives.  María is 71 years old and the single mother of seven children who are all adults.  One of them still lives with her at home.

María is a very tenacious woman who prepares and sells sausages in order to provide for herself.  She has a restaurant in her house where she sells  delicious food such as sausage stew, roasted yellow plantain and barbecued sausages.  These dishes are very much appreciated by her customers.  María has been in this business for more than 25 years and it has allowed her to make progress and gain a lot of customers who know just how delicious her dishes are.  She works every day with the help of her son.

María will use this loan to buy rice, pig intestines and various supplies that she needs for preparing her food.  She has been a member of her community bank from the beginning and she enjoys being a member because it has helped her a lot over the years.  Her dreams are to make progress in her business and to enjoy good health.

loans.use: to buy rice, pig intestines and other supplies

loans.name: Mercedes Maribel

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Desarrollo Femenino. Este lugar se lo conoce por su rica gastronomía y su vegetación,  la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y comercio en general.

En este lugar vive la señora Mercedes, tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  17, 14 y 9 años, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en  escuela. Su esposo es mecánico industrial.

Ella realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su esposo el cual tiene un taller mecánico donde realizan diversos trabajos como construcción de carrocerías para todo tipo de carros, también trabajan  con carrocerías y pintura de autobuses,  para realizar estos trabajos ellos tiene que contratar hasta dos o tres operarios a los cuales tiene que darles el almuerzo. Su esposo lleva más de 21 años dedicado a esta actividad. 

Este crédito es para comprar pintura, hierro, suelda y otros materiales necesarios para realizar sus trabajos. Lleva 10 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido ayudar a su esposo en su trabajo. 

Sus sueños seguir adelante y que no les falte trabajo.
texts.en:
The members of the “Desarrollo Femenino” communal bank meet every two weeks in the Calderón parish of the city of Portoviejo.  This area is known for its delicious food and for its vegetation.  Most of its residents are involved in farming and general business.

Mercedes lives here.  She is 44 years old, married, and has three children, ages 17, 14, and 9.  The two oldest attend high school and the youngest is in elementary school.  Her husband is a commercial mechanic.

She is asking for this loan so that she can help her husband who has a mechanics workshop where he does different things, such as building bodies for all types of cars.  He also works with bus bodies and painting.  In order to do this, he needs to hire two or three helpers to whom he must also provide lunch.  Her husband has been doing this for more than 21 years.

This loan will be used to buy paint, iron, solder, and other supplies needed to do his work.  She has been with the communal bank for 10 years and she likes it because the loans have allowed her to help her husband with his work.

Her dreams are to continue moving ahead and that there be no shortage of work.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Blanca Tulmira

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Desarrollo Femenino. Este lugar se lo conoce por su rica gastronomía y su vegetación, la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y comercio en general.

En este lugar vive la señora Blanca, tiene 52 años de edad, está separada pero de esta  relación tuvo cinco  hijos todos mayores de edad,  dos de ellos aun vive con ella.
 
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto solventar los gastos del hogar, hace 12 años atrás empezó un negocio de venta de encebollados (plato típico), los fines de semana arrela un pequeño local en su domicilio en el cual vende este delicioso plato que es de mucho agrado de las personas, también sus hijos llevan a vender este plato en un triciclo a un lugar muy concurrido de la localidad.
 
Este crédito es para comprar pescado,  yuca, sodas y varios víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio.
  
Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
In the Calderon parish in the city of Portoviejo, the members of the communal bank Desarollo Femenino meet every fifteen days.  This area is known for its rich gastronomy and vegetation, and most of the inhabitants work in agricultural or sales.

It is home to Blanca, 52 years old, who is separated with five adult children, two of whom still live with her.

Blanca is a hardworking woman who, in order to provide for herself and cover household expenses, began a business selling encebollados (a typical dish) twelve years ago.
